TopicTitle: Vibrate/Rumble feedback on a gamepad or joystick

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I've started using a gamepad to better control my rockets and rovers

Is there any way to turn on vibrate or rumble feedback? Is this something that's supported in-game?
I would love to have it work for contact with the ground, as well as rapid acceleration, like the screen wobble. It'd add a great element to the game.

Cheers,
Adam
